# HUD::SET_BLIP_AS_SHORT_RANGE

## Summary
Set a blip as short range - on off

## Parameters
* **BLIP_INDEX** blip
* **BOOL** onOff

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Sets whether or not the specified blip should only be displayed when nearby, or on the minimap.
